tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from a  tooth ache on root canal tooth only, before visiting Smilessence clinic, i visited many dentist and they told me to do implant instead of root canal. However when i consulted to Dr Sonia, she find out the way for root canal it was her only who suggested to go with it.. which saved my tooth going from implant surgery.
I am thankful for the excellent root canal treatment did by Dr. Sonia. From start to finish, her professionalism and expertise were exceptional. She made the process smooth and comfortable, and i am now pain free. 
I am highly recommend Smilessence clinic services for any type of dental care and treatment.
Thank you Dr. Sonia
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback ... Highly appreciated üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The most important trait of a doctor is to draw upon the best resources available to find a solution which is in the interest of the patient . We all read about ‚Äú client centricity‚Äù  in the management  books , here you get a first hand experience of the same . 
A  very pleasant demeanour  of the doctors coupled with a  spic and span clinic and  above all the you are in the best hands with two MDS  doctors  specialising in  Endodontics  and Prosthodontics , all under one roof and personally attending to you if there is a need . 
Would recommend  to anyone without any hesitation as you are in an ethical practise and being explained what is a necessity  and how ‚Äú a stitch in time can save nine ‚Äú as goes the English proverb . Wishing them all the best ! Regards Puneet
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback ... Highly appreciated ! üëç
